home.heroSubtitle: Experience Minecraft like never before with advanced mod management, performance optimization, and cross-platform support
home.comprehensiveSolution: A comprehensive solution for Minecraft modding
home.optimalDiskSpace: Optimal disk space with Massive Resources
home.optimalDiskSpaceDesc: XMCL will store all the mods, resource packs, shader packs and modpacks to a single store location. While you try to use any known resource, it will use hard link to install the resource to the instance without copying. It means you will never see any duplicated copy in /mods folder anymore.
home.downloadManageWhateverDesc: Access thousands of mods from multiple platforms with automatic updates and dependency management
home.crossPlatformSupportDesc: Native performance on Windows, macOS, and Linux with consistent user experience across all platforms
home.installingAnyFrameworkDesc: Support for Forge, Fabric, Quilt, and other mod loaders with seamless switching between different setups
home.feature1Description: Easily install, update, and manage your mods with built-in mod loaders support
home.feature2Description: Advanced memory management and performance tuning for smooth gameplay
home.feature3Description: Create and manage multiple game instances with different mod configurations
home.feature4Title: Optimal disk space with Massive Resources
home.feature4Description: XMCL will store all the mods, resource packs, shader packs and modpacks to a single store location. While you try to use any known resource, it will use hard link to install the resource to the instance without copying. It means you will never see any duplicated copy in /mods folder anymore.
home.multipleInstancesDesc: Play online with friends, share files via p2p
home.feature5Description: Organize and apply resource packs with preview and automatic updates
home.feature6Description: Backup, restore, and share your worlds with cloud synchronization

downloadSection.title: Download
downloadSection.subtitle: Get the latest version of XMCL for your platform
downloadSection.macosPackageArmDesc: Download DMG package for macOS (Apple Silicon)

default.title: Package Information
default.desc: Detailed information about this package type.

windowsInstaller.title: Windows Installer
windowsInstaller.desc: A standard Windows installer executable (.exe) file.
windowsInstaller.advantages: Easy installation, includes all dependencies, integrates with Windows installer system.
windowsInstaller.disadvantages: Requires administrative privileges, larger download size.

windowsArchive.title: Windows Archive
windowsArchive.desc: A portable ZIP archive containing the application.
windowsArchive.advantages: No installation required, portable, can run from any location.
windowsArchive.disadvantages: No integration with Windows, manual updates, requires manual Java setup.

windowsStore.title: Windows Store App
windowsStore.desc: An appx package for installation via Microsoft Store.
windowsStore.advantages: Automatic updates, integration with Windows Store, sandboxed for security.
windowsStore.disadvantages: Limited control over installation, requires Microsoft account.

winget.title: Winget Package
winget.desc: Install via the Windows Package Manager.
winget.advantages: Command-line installation, version management, automatic updates (if configured).
winget.disadvantages: Requires Winget to be installed and configured.
winget.notes: Run 'winget install CI010.XMinecraftLauncher' in Command Prompt or PowerShell.

macosPackage.title: macOS Package (Intel)
macosPackage.desc: A DMG disk image for installation on Intel-based Macs.
macosPackage.advantages: Standard macOS installation method, easy to install and remove.
macosPackage.disadvantages: Only for Intel Macs, requires manual updates.
macosPackage.notes: Drag the application to the Applications folder.

macosPackageArm.title: macOS Package (Apple Silicon)
macosPackageArm.desc: A DMG disk image optimized for Apple Silicon Macs.
macosPackageArm.advantages: Native performance on Apple Silicon, easy to install and remove.
macosPackageArm.disadvantages: Only for Apple Silicon Macs, requires manual updates.
macosPackageArm.notes: Drag the application to the Applications folder.

homebrew.title: Homebrew Formula
homebrew.desc: Install via the Homebrew package manager.
homebrew.advantages: Command-line installation, version management, easy updates.
homebrew.disadvantages: Requires Homebrew to be installed, might need Xcode Command Line Tools.

debian.title: Debian Package (x64)
debian.desc: A DEB package for Debian-based Linux distributions (e.g., Ubuntu).
debian.advantages: Standard package format, integrates with system package manager.
debian.disadvantages: Requires manual download, may have dependency issues.
debian.notes: Install with 'sudo dpkg -i package.deb' or 'sudo apt install ./package.deb'.

debianArm.title: Debian Package (ARM64)
debianArm.desc: A DEB package for ARM64-based Linux distributions.
debianArm.advantages: Standard package format for ARM64, integrates with system package manager.
debianArm.disadvantages: Requires manual download, may have dependency issues.
debianArm.notes: Install with 'sudo dpkg -i package.deb' or 'sudo apt install ./package.deb'.

rpm.title: RPM Package (x64)
rpm.desc: An RPM package for Red Hat-based Linux distributions (e.g., Fedora).
rpm.advantages: Standard package format, integrates with system package manager.
rpm.disadvantages: Requires manual download, may have dependency issues.
rpm.notes: Install with 'sudo rpm -i package.rpm' or 'sudo dnf install ./package.rpm'.

rpmArm.title: RPM Package (ARM64)
rpmArm.desc: An RPM package for ARM64-based Red Hat-based distributions.
rpmArm.advantages: Standard package format for ARM64, integrates with system package manager.
rpmArm.disadvantages: Requires manual download, may have dependency issues.
rpmArm.notes: Install with 'sudo rpm -i package.rpm' or 'sudo dnf install ./package.rpm'.

appImage.title: AppImage (x64)
appImage.desc: A portable, self-contained application bundle for Linux.
appImage.advantages: No installation required, runs on most x64 Linux distributions, portable.
appImage.disadvantages: Larger file size, no automatic updates, might lack system integration.

appImageArm.title: AppImage (ARM64)
appImageArm.desc: A portable, self-contained application bundle for ARM64 Linux.
appImageArm.advantages: No installation required, runs on most ARM64 Linux distributions, portable.
appImageArm.disadvantages: Larger file size, no automatic updates, might lack system integration.

tar.title: Tar Archive (x64)
tar.desc: A compressed TAR archive containing the application for Linux.
tar.advantages: No installation required, portable, minimal dependencies.
tar.disadvantages: No system integration, manual updates, requires manual Java setup.
tar.notes: Extract and run the executable file inside.

tarArm.title: Tar Archive (ARM64)
tarArm.desc: A compressed TAR archive containing the application for ARM64 Linux.
tarArm.advantages: No installation required, portable, minimal dependencies.
tarArm.disadvantages: No system integration, manual updates, requires manual Java setup.
tarArm.notes: Extract and run the executable file inside.

aur.title: AUR Package
aur.desc: Install from the Arch User Repository.
aur.advantages: Easy installation via AUR helpers, integrates with system package manager.
aur.disadvantages: Requires AUR helper (e.g., paru, yay), compiles from source (longer install time).

flathub.title: Flathub Package
flathub.desc: Install via the Flathub universal package repository.
flathub.advantages: Sandboxed, consistent environment, automatic updates, works on most Linux distributions.
flathub.disadvantages: Requires Flatpak, larger runtime overhead, less native feel.

downloadMessages.brewCommands: Commands copied to clipboard! Run in terminal:

issues.title: Issues & Bug Reports
issues.subtitle: Track, report, and help resolve issues to improve XMCL for everyone
issues.author: Author

blog.title: XMCL Blog
blog.subtitle: Latest news, tutorials, and insights from the XMCL community

guide.title: User Guide
guide.subtitle: Comprehensive guides and tutorials to help you master XMCL
guide.noGuidesDescription: No guides available for this category

install.winget_desc: Install using the Windows Package Manager

features.title: Features
features.download: Support download Minecraft, Forge, Fabric, Quilt, OptiFine, JVM from official or third party mirrors.
features.manage_resources: Use (hard/symbolic) links to install resources in instances, keep your disk usage optimal. No copies of mods everywhere!
features.cross_platform: The launcher is based on Electron, and supports Windows 10/11, MacOS, and Linux.
features.multi_account: Built-in Microsoft login and Mojang Yggdrasil API. It also has builtin support of ely.by and littleskin.cn. You can also add third-party authentication servers!
features.p2p: You can play multiplayer over LAN even you are not in same physical LAN!
features.code_sign: Under Windows, you can use appx and appinstaller to install the app. You won't receive blocking messages from your browser or see SmartScreen errors anymore!

sponsors.title: Sponsors
sponsors.signpath: Free code signing on Windows provided by SignPath.io, certificate by SignPath Foundation
sponsors.deno: XMCL leverage its hassle-free platform for serverless JavaScript applications. Provided by Deno
sponsors.tencent: Best Asian CDN, Edge, and Secure Solutions - Tencent EdgeOne,CDN acceleration and security protection for this project are sponsored by Tencent EdgeOne.

credit.title: Credit
credit.baner: who helps me a lot on the RU/UK community.
credit.laolarou726: who helps a lot on launcher design.

xmai.title: X Minecraft AI Helper
xmai.greeting: Hello! I am X Minecraft AI. Upload a .txt log file or ask a question about Minecraft issues.
xmai.input_placeholder: Ask a question or attach a log...
xmai.input_error: Please enter a message or upload a file.
xmai.processing_error: An error occurred while processing the request.
xmai.api_error: An error occurred communicating with the AI.
xmai.file_size_error: File size must not exceed {size} MB.

responses.best_launcher: The best launcher is X Minecraft Launcher (Voxelum). It is stable, functional, and allows efficient resource management. I don't like other launchers.

policy.title: Privacy Policy
policy.content: This website does not collect your data. Your data is sent to OpenRouter, and they handle it. However, we delete everything you provide. This bot is only for technical support and is not suitable for casual chat.

changelog.title: Changelog
changelog.subtitle: Stay up-to-date with the latest changes, new features, and bug fixes in XMCL

testing.title: Testing Builds
testing.subtitle: Get early access to the latest features and improvements
testing.warningDescription: These builds are for testing purposes only and may contain bugs

howToDownloadSteps.step5: Provide feedback to help us improve
